property.name: dfs.journalnode.https-address
property.description: The address and port the JournalNode HTTPS server listens on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.journalnode.https-bind-host
property.description: The actual address the HTTP server will bind to. If this optional address is set, it overrides only the hostname portion of dfs.journalnode.https-address. This is useful for making the JournalNode HTTP server listen on all interfaces by setting it to 0.0.0.0.
